mentions.textExcerpt: The sound of Maël’s feet making contact with the Soccer Ball echoed again.
Maël called up the panel again.
Maël’s eyes lit up.
Maël had a hunch, but he didn’t waste too much time thinking about it.
Maël dreamed of the future.
Maël didn’t know how long he had been practicing or how many shots he had taken.
Maël felt refreshed. He hummed a tune as he walked back to the Dormitory.
Maël answered honestly.
Maël smiled.
Maël replied.
Maël hung up the phone, feeling a wave of drowsiness.
Maël was stunned for a long time, feeling a mix of emotions.
Maël woke up feeling sore all over, probably due to the intense training the day before.
Maël went to the equipment room and borrowed 10 Soccer Balls, then headed to the field to start his shooting practice.
Maël placed all the Soccer Balls in front of the Penalty Arc and fired off two shots, both hitting the target with good quality.
Maël drank some water and rested for a while before forcing himself to finish lunch in the Canteen.
Maël dragged his tired body back to the training field for another round of practice.
Maël felt a surge of strength in his legs and ankles, and his muscle memory for shooting rapidly improved.
The sound of Maël’s feet making contact with the Soccer Ball echoed again.
He picked up the Soccer Ball and started his shooting practice again.
Maël swung his leg and took another shot. Overwhelmed by excitement, he kicked too hard and sent the ball soaring into the sky.
Maël didn’t know how long he had been practicing or how many shots he had taken.
Maël dragged his leaden right leg and carrying the Soccer Ball back to the Dormitory.
Maël went to the equipment room and borrowed 10 Soccer Balls, then headed to the field to start his shooting practice.
Maël placed all the Soccer Balls in front of the Penalty Arc and fired off two shots, both hitting the target with good quality.
One after another, the Soccer Balls hit the Goal Net, causing it to shake violently and indent.
【Skill: Long Shot Level 1】
【Proficiency: (38/100)】
【Effect: You gradually feel】
At this rate, he might be able to upgrade Long Shot to Level 2 in just two or three days.
【Skill: Long Shot Level 1】
【Proficiency: (61/100)】
【Effect: You gradually feel】
【Skill: Powerful Shot Level 2】
【Proficiency: (1/300)】
【Effect: After long practice, your Long Shot ability has begun to show its potential. When you have sufficient preparation time and full power, you can occasionally produce an excellent Long Shot!】
Maël dragged his leaden right leg and carrying the Soccer Ball back to the Dormitory.
He hummed a tune as he walked back to the Dormitory.
After a nap in the Dormitory, at three in the afternoon, he dragged his tired body back to the training field for another round of practice.
They usually slept in the Dormitory and ate at the Training Base’s Canteen, so there wasn’t much to spend on.
They usually slept in the Dormitory and ate at the Training Base’s Canteen, so there wasn’t much to spend on.
Maël drank some water and rested for a while before forcing himself to finish lunch in the Canteen.
It was Uncle calling.
How have things been these past few days?
Uncle’s voice came from the other end.
Younger Sister has been looking for you. I’ll let her take the phone, Eva!

Another message followed, from Uncle’s phone number: 'It’s been a long time since you bought new soccer shoes. Buy a pair tomorrow. Uncle can’t give you much, but I hope you can achieve your dreams at Arsenal.'
Uncle’s youngest sister, Eva, was seven years old and had the best relationship with the original owner, being the most adorable.
When will big brother come back?
Can I see big brother play on TV?
I’m about to have summer vacation, so I can go out every day. I want big brother to take me to eat pizza.
Especially after Coach Hans lent him a pair of soccer shoes, he had nothing to worry about.

Another message followed, from Uncle’s phone number: 'It’s been a long time since you bought new soccer shoes. Buy a pair tomorrow. Uncle can’t give you much, but I hope you can achieve your dreams at Arsenal.'
Usually, the Arsenal Youth Academy had two training sessions a day: Morning Training and Afternoon Training.
Time was running out, and he needed to have a standout feature to catch the eye of the Coaching Staff!
If the Team Equipment Room hadn’t already closed, he would have borrowed a few more Soccer Balls to kick and retrieve.
Maël went to the equipment room and borrowed 10 Soccer Balls, then headed to the field to start his shooting practice.
Maël placed all the Soccer Balls in front of the Penalty Arc and fired off two shots, both hitting the target with good quality.
One after another, the Soccer Balls hit the Goal Net, causing it to shake violently and indent.

entityDetails.name: Maël
entityDetails.description: A young soccer player training intensely to improve his skills and make a name for himself at the Arsenal Youth Academy
entityDetails.physicalTraits: Not explicitly described, but implied to be fit and capable of intense physical training
entityDetails.motivations: To improve his Long Shot skill, catch the eye of the Coaching Staff, and achieve his dream of playing professionally
entityDetails.status: Exhausted but motivated, with a significant increase in proficiency
entityDetails.notes: Receives financial support from his Uncle and has a close relationship with his younger sister, Eva

entityDetails.name: Soccer Ball
entityDetails.description: The primary object used by Maël for his training
entityDetails.physicalTraits: Not explicitly described, but implied to be a standard soccer ball
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Central tool for Maël's practice and skill improvement
entityDetails.notes: Maël uses multiple Soccer Balls to increase his training efficiency

entityDetails.name: Long Shot
entityDetails.description: A shooting skill that Maël is focusing on improving
abilities: Occasionally produce an excellent Long Shot with sufficient preparation and full power (Level 2)
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Key skill being developed by Maël
entityDetails.notes: Maël's proficiency increased significantly through intense practice

entityDetails.name: Dormitory
entityDetails.description: The place where Maël and other trainees sleep and rest
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Maël's living quarters at the Arsenal Youth Academy
entityDetails.status: Serves as a resting place after intense training
entityDetails.notes: Maël returns here after his training sessions

entityDetails.name: Training Base
entityDetails.description: The facility where Maël and other trainees practice and train
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Primary location for Maël's training activities
entityDetails.notes: Includes a Canteen and an Equipment Room

entityDetails.name: Canteen
entityDetails.description: The dining area at the Training Base where trainees eat
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Place where Maël eats his meals
entityDetails.status: Operational and serves meals to trainees
entityDetails.notes: Maël eats breakfast and lunch here

entityDetails.name: Uncle
entityDetails.description: Maël's supportive relative who provides financial and emotional support
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Cares for Maël and encourages him to pursue his dreams
entityDetails.motivations: Wants Maël to succeed and offers a fallback plan if he can't stay at the Academy
entityDetails.status: Concerned about Maël's well-being and progress
entityDetails.notes: Transfers money to Maël and offers to help him find an apprenticeship if needed

entityDetails.name: Eva
entityDetails.description: Maël's younger sister who has a close relationship with him
entityDetails.physicalTraits: Seven years old, described as adorable
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Supportive and excited about Maël's potential success
entityDetails.motivations: Wants to see Maël play on TV and spend time with him
entityDetails.status: Looking forward to Maël's success and summer vacation
entityDetails.notes: Has a sweet and innocent voice, and is well-behaved

entityDetails.name: Coach Hans
entityDetails.description: A coach at the Arsenal Youth Academy who has lent Maël a pair of soccer shoes
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Supportive coach who helps Maël with his equipment
entityDetails.motivations: Wants to see Maël succeed and improve
entityDetails.status: Has lent Maël a pair of soccer shoes
entityDetails.notes: Mentioned as a source of support for Maël

entityDetails.name: Arsenal Youth Academy
entityDetails.description: The training facility where Maël is pursuing his soccer career
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Primary setting for Maël's training and development
entityDetails.status: Active and structured with a training schedule
entityDetails.notes: Includes multiple training sessions and cultural studies classes

entityDetails.name: Coaching Staff
entityDetails.description: The group of coaches and trainers at the Arsenal Youth Academy
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Evaluates and trains the young players
entityDetails.motivations: To identify and develop talented players
entityDetails.status: Active and influential in Maël's career progression
entityDetails.notes: Maël aims to catch their eye with his improved skills

entityDetails.name: Team Equipment Room
entityDetails.description: The facility where trainees can borrow equipment
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Source of Soccer Balls for Maël's training
entityDetails.notes: Maël borrows multiple Soccer Balls from here

entityDetails.name: Penalty Arc
entityDetails.description: The area on the soccer field where Maël places the Soccer Balls for his shooting practice
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Specific location for Maël's shooting practice
entityDetails.status: Used by Maël for his training
entityDetails.notes: Maël places all the Soccer Balls here before starting his practice

entityDetails.name: Goal Net
entityDetails.description: The target for Maël's shooting practice
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Receives the Soccer Balls during Maël's practice
entityDetails.status: Shaken and indented by the force of Maël's shots
entityDetails.notes: Indicates the effectiveness of Maël's practice
